releaseNotes:
As part of this release we had [7 issues](https://github.com/chocolatey/boxstarter/issues?milestone=1&state=closed) closed.
__bug__
- [__#324__](https://github.com/chocolatey/boxstarter/issues/324) 2.11.0 packages missing chocolatey dlls for remote installs
__enhancements__
- [__#323__](https://github.com/chocolatey/boxstarter/issues/323) Build script install deprecated package WindowsAzurePowershell - [__#320__](https://github.com/chocolatey/boxstarter/pull/320) implement DelegateChocoSources switch to enable source feed passing - [__#312__](https://github.com/chocolatey/boxstarter/issues/312) Chocolatey Package - include verification/license files - [__#311__](https://github.com/chocolatey/boxstarter/issues/311) Chocolatey Packages - Don't include XML files - [__#227__](https://github.com/chocolatey/boxstarter/issues/227) SignTool error when running build.bat
__Documentation__
- [__#321__](https://github.com/chocolatey/boxstarter/issues/321) No Visual Studio Prereqs Specified In Docs
